name: font-loader
title: FontLoader
description: Internal utility that automatically injects Google Fonts (Libre Baskerville, DM Sans, JetBrains Mono) into the document head. Since v1.1.4, ThemeProvider includes FontLoader by default. Only use directly if you disabled auto font loading with disableAutoFontLoading prop.

props.name: onLoad
props.description: Callback when fonts are loaded successfully.

props.name: onError
props.description: Callback when fonts fail to load.

props.name: showLoadingState
props.description: Show loading state while fonts are loading. When true, children are hidden until fonts load.

props.name: loadingComponent
props.description: Custom loading component displayed while fonts load (requires showLoadingState).

props.name: children
props.description: Children to render. Will wait for fonts if showLoadingState is true.

examples.title: Automatic via ThemeProvider (recommended)
Standalone with callbacks

notes: Injects preconnect links for faster font loading
Falls back to system fonts if Google Fonts fails to load
Does not block rendering by default (showLoadingState is false)
